faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.

q1.question: Is Snapri Snaps free to use?
q1.answer: Yes, Snapri Snaps offers a free version with core features like meal logging and basic nutritional analysis. We also have a premium subscription with advanced features like personalized meal plans, detailed reports, and priority support.

q2.question: How accurate is the nutritional analysis?
q2.answer: Our AI is trained on a massive database of food items and provides highly accurate estimates. While it's a powerful tool for guidance, for medical purposes, you should always consult with a registered dietitian or doctor.

q3.question: Can I use Snapri Snaps for special diets like keto or vegan?
q3.answer: Absolutely! You can set your dietary preferences, including keto, vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, and more. The app will tailor its analysis and suggestions to fit your specific needs.

q4.question: Does the app work for non-Western cuisines?
q4.answer: Yes. We've put a special emphasis on supporting a wide range of international cuisines, including culturally-aware analysis for Middle Eastern, Asian, and other global foods.

about.title: About Snapri Snaps
about.subtitle: A celebration of global cuisine and a commitment to personalized nutrition.
about.missionP1: Snapri Snaps was founded by Ghada Al-Ani, a talented software engineer from Baghdad, Iraq. Growing up with the rich flavors of Iraqi cuisine, she developed a deep appreciation for how food connects us to our heritage.
about.missionP2: While living abroad, she noticed a critical flaw in popular health and wellness apps: they struggled to accurately analyze diverse, international dishes. As an engineer, she saw a technical challenge and an opportunity.
about.missionP3: Driven to solve this problem, Ghada leveraged her engineering expertise to create a tool that was both technologically advanced and culturally intelligent. Snapri Snaps is a celebration of global cuisine and a commitment to making personalized nutrition accessible to everyone, one snap at a time.
